People Are Saying

At the start of our project, Donna listened to us carefully, learned our goals and ideas for the space and then surpassed our expectations by creating an exquisite design for a master bathroom that we could not have imagined. She incorporated our aspirations and offered us a creative, carefully crafted vision of our new bathroom and bedroom, and used computerized graphics to show us what we could have.

Then, once the work started, the attention and care Donna and her crew took with every detail, from the visibly seamless English wallpaper to the exceptional molding work around our shower, led to beautiful results. She offered little touches to make the master bathroom unique, such as crystal doorknobs.

Donna and each of her contractors were always courteous, industrious and professional. They demonstrated a consistent conviction to do the job right the first time, and in a timely, efficient manner. We could not have been more thrilled with the results!

— Bob Kirschman

Donna visualized the perfect master bath for us. She expanded our bathroom to encompass the dressing area, finding gorgeous wallpaper, a double sink vanity, incorporating a small TV in a wall niche, creating a make-up area between the sinks for convenience and also stayed true to our request for polished brass accents throughout.

Her amazing crew hand-crafted French doors with a transom overhead to allow natural light into the master bath, and she topped it all off with crystal accents in the door knobs, Swarovski crystal drawer pulls, a dramatic crystal and gold lighting fixture, fabrics that updated three of our current pieces through reupholstering for our bedroom and bath, and by adding crown molding throughout.

Her attention to detail also provided us with strict adherence to code and allowed us to address and upgrade a couple of electrical issues that could have posed a danger to our home in the coming years. Donna was also onsite while the work was being done, providing us confidence that the end product would meet her high standards.

We highly recommend Donna Moore Interiors!

— Lisa Lahrman

Simply put, Donna is a really good person and a gifted designer. She approaches projects with creative talent, concern and effort. She took the time to understand what we wanted. I watched how she looks at a room and visualizes it. I smile when I look at things we did thanks to Donna.

— Sally W.

I am delighted with the changes! Donna’s client-centered approach to the design process contributed to her success. I was impressed by her professionalism. She was excellent at keeping me informed about the status of my project. I expect to work with Donna again.

— Sandy Stoddard

We trusted Donna to do a complete renovation of our new condo to accommodate a family member’s wheelchair. She faithfully managed every detail of the project. She solved problems we hadn’t anticipated. We enjoy the beauty and colors in our new home and live so comfortably here.

— Dr. Chin Hua Wang

We enjoyed working with Donna so much that we hired her to design almost our entire house! She understood how we value family heirlooms and worked with us to include them in the new spaces. Donna’s sense of color, texture and functionality really transformed our home. We’re looking forward to working with her on our next project.

— Jean U.

Donna Moore Interiors transformed our dated home into one that should be featured in Southern Living Magazine. During our complete home renovation, Donna assured us she would be there at each step of the design and construction process. Her attention to detail was amazing!

— Greg and Kim Hise

Donna’s can do attitude and knowledge of design helped us solve our project’s challenges. She incorporated innovative designs into our project while keeping the look beautiful and timeless. Donna is a pleasure to work with and we were so impressed by her highly skilled team!

— Anne Shively

Donna’s keen insight allowed me to see areas in my home in a new light. Donna listened to what I wanted. Her understanding of space planning took my dreams from paper to finished project. She created beautiful spaces. I look forward to working with Donna on our master bath renovation.

— Bonnie Rekemeyer
